questions.question: In class diagrams, a class is represented with a
From a class diagram it is evident that

answers.b: Each class is related with every other class

questions.question: What does a sequence diagram represent?

answers.b: How classes are related to each other
answers.c: Sequence of events flow to achieve a target
answers.d: Sequence of activities to be performed before moving to next state
